body.p: The CZT project consists of the following subprojects:

section.title: ZML
section.p: This defines an XML markup for Z specifications.

section.title: Corejava
section.p: Corejava contains AST (Annotated Syntax Tree) classes for standard Z, written in Java. It is closely related to the XML Schema described in ZML. Actually, most of the classes and interfaces in corejava are automatically generated from the XML Schema using the code generator Gnast.

section.title: Gnast
section.p: This is a code generator that generates Java interfaces and classes (for instance, the AST in Corejava) from an XML Schema.

section.title: Parser
section.p: This is a parser for standard Z that is under development. Eventually, the parser will be extended to support Object-Z and TCOZ (or several variants of the parser will be produced). The output of the parser is an XML file, using the ZML format.
